entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Driving Theory Test 4 in 1 Kit
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Learn to Drive UnlimitedÔºö$24.99 ‚Üí $19.99 [$19.99 ~ $24.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$5.99

In-App Purchases

  • Learn to Drive UK - 1 monthÔºö$3.99
  • Learn to Drive UK - 12 monthsÔºö$14.99
  • Learn to Drive UK - 3 monthsÔºö$11.99
  • Learn to Drive UnlimitedÔºö$19.99
  • Learn to Drive UK - UnlimitedÔºö$9.99
  • Learn to Drive UK - 3 monthÔºö$11.99

Application Description

**Apple's No.1 paid iPhone app for 7 years running** 97% of learners pass their Theory Test using nothing more than this 4 in 1 AWARD-WINNING app*! Revise with full confidence knowing you have EVERYTHING you need to pass your 2025 Theory Test first time, getting you 1 step closer to your full DVLA licence, or we‚Äôll give you your test fee back if you fail. Join the 18 MILLION+ learner drivers we‚Äôve helped prepare for their driving theory test. Suitable for: ‚Ä¢ Car Drivers in GB & NI ‚Ä¢ Motorcyclists in GB & NI ‚Ä¢ Trainee ADI's in GB & NI ‚Ä¢ HGV/LGV & PCV Drivers preparing to take Module 1a and 1b Tests in GB & NI DRIVING THEORY TEST 2025 Practise the latest Theory Test revision questions, answers and explanations, licensed directly from the DVSA (the people who set the official test). No other Theory Test app contains more revision questions! Sit UNLIMITED timed mock tests including the NEW DVSA video case studies. Car drivers can practise multiple-choice questions based on a short video...just like the real test. Keep a daily track of your progress so you know when you‚Äôre ready to sit the official Theory Test! FREE PASS GUARANTEE We‚Äôre so confident that our app will help you pass your Driving Theory Test, we will give you your ¬£23 test fee back if you fail after completing the revision plan in full. Available for learner car drivers and motorcyclists only. T&C‚Äôs apply**. LEARNER PLAN Struggling to know where to start with your Theory Test revision? Our structured Learner Plan ensures you a first time pass, guiding you through your revision from start to finish. LEADERBOARD Rev up your revision with our NEW weekly Leaderboard! Earn points for acing practice quizzes, passing Mock Tests and more. Revise for a prize as you make the most of your study sessions. SMART AI MODE Want a more tailored approach to revision? Smart AI Mode makes revising for your theory test more efficient and tracks your progress to help you concentrate on the areas where you need the most support. VOICEOVER English voiceover available for all Driving Theory Test revision questions PLUS The Highway Code...ideal for users with reading difficulties or dyslexia. HAZARD PERCEPTION TEST 85 interactive video clips, including all 34 DVSA CGI clips covering bad weather and night time driving, with built-in cheat detection just like in the official test. THE HIGHWAY CODE 2025 Edition Revise and refresh your knowledge of the latest UK Highway Code. Includes English voiceover. ROAD SIGNS 2025 Learn ALL the UK road signs with over 1,500 photos and descriptions. Optional LEARN TO DRIVE PRACTICAL CAR DRIVING CONTENT Includes: ‚Ä¢ 3 day trial access to over 250 virtual Practical Driving Lesson videos, to help you learn and understand the routines and manoeuvres that you could be asked to perform on your Driving Test ‚Ä¢ The top 10 reasons for failing ‚Ä¢ Learn how to banish test nerves and anxiety ‚Ä¢ A full mock driving test with examiner debrief ‚Ä¢ All the latest DVSA help and advice on the 'Ready to Pass?' campaign Helping you get one step closer to your full DVLA licence EXCLUSIVE BONUS CONTENT Access to exclusive offers and discounts! AWARDS: ‚Ä¢ Named Apple's No.1 paid iPhone app of 2024, 2023, 2022, 2021, 2020, 2019 & 2018 ‚Ä¢ As featured on the Gadget Show ‚Ä¢ Intelligent Instructor Product of the Year 2022, 2023 & 2024 ‚Ä¢ App of the Year, FirstCar Awards 2021 & 2019 ‚Ä¢ Winner of the Auto Express Theory Test App ‚Ä¢ DIA Driver and Rider Training Awards "Product of the Year" CONTACT US: support@drivingtestsuccess.com This app includes the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) revision question bank. The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) has given permission for the reproduction of Crown copyright material. DVSA does not accept responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction. Requires account creation to access content. *Based users who complete the Learner Plan in full **Pass Guarantee T&C‚Äôs apply. See www.drivingtestsuccess.com/app-pass-guarantee

entry.title: Iron Marines: RTS offline game
entry.summary:
Hero Dr.Graff: $4.99 ‚Üí $2.99
Hero Blue Dragon: $6.99 ‚Üí $4.99
Hero Sha'Tra: $4.99 ‚Üí $2.99
Hero Ajax: $2.99 ‚Üí $0.99
Hero Mark X: $6.99 ‚Üí $4.99
Hero Fate: $2.99 ‚Üí $0.99
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Hero Dr.GraffÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]
  • Hero Blue DragonÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $6.99]
  • Hero Sha'TraÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]
  • Hero AjaxÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $2.99]
  • Hero Mark XÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $6.99]
  • Hero FateÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $2.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

In-App Purchases

  • Hero Dr.GraffÔºö$2.99
  • Hero Blue DragonÔºö$4.99
  • Hero Sha'TraÔºö$2.99
  • Hero AjaxÔºö$0.99
  • Hero SparasÔºö$2.99
  • Hero RoyÔºö$0.99
  • Hero Mark XÔºö$4.99
  • Hero FateÔºö$0.99
  • Hero DarwinÔºö$0.99
  • Hero TrabucoÔºö$2.99

Application Description

From the creators of the award winner, Kingdom Rush saga comes the most extraordinary space odyssey. Fight challenging real time strategy sci fi battles on amazing and unknown planets. Command brave soldiers, mighty mechas and powerful aliens against hordes of space monsters, swarms of insectoids and robot armies in a galaxy far far away. PLAN, ATTACK AND BEAT ALL THE ENEMIES ADAPTING YOUR STRATEGY by changing the role of your troops even in the thick of the combat, from ranger to sniper, from flamethrowers to missile launchers. ADAPT YOUR STRATEGY by changing the role of your troops even in the thick of battle, from ranger to sniper, from flamethrowers to missile launchers. RECRUIT AND TRAIN THE GREATEST HEROES in the galaxy, lead them into dangerous territory against near-impossible odds and unleash their mighty powers and abilities. TURN THE TIDE OF BATTLE with orbital strikes, intelligent mines, support troops, turrets and a wide array of special weapons. Armies of robots, crushed starships, gigantic monsters, unknown races, brave assaults, desperate rescues, audacious sabotages... the galaxy needs your command. The galaxy needs the Iron Marines FEATURES ‚Ä¢ 21 CAMPAIGN MISSIONS across three sci fi planets. Each action-packed challenge will have you improve your strategy to save the galaxy! ‚Ä¢ 17 SPECIAL OPERATIONS that will test if you have what it takes to battle your way through space. ‚Ä¢ 40+ UPGRADES to build the ultimate RTS army! Choose between Defense Drones, Napalm Rockets, Ricocheting Blasts, Lethal Weapons and many more. ‚Ä¢ +7 UNITS to bring into battle and give your hero some extra firepower! ‚Ä¢ 8 SPECIAL WEAPONS to unleash hell on your enemies and keep expanding your tactics like space itself! What‚Äôs better than a well-placed missile? An orbital strike of 50 high-explosive missiles! ‚Ä¢ DEFEAT UNIQUE BOSSES in epic battles. They are green, mean, killing machines!!! Well‚Ä¶ some are machines and these aliens aren‚Äôt green‚Ä¶ but they‚Äôre all massive and determined to crush you. Suit up, Marines! ‚Ä¢ 70+ ACHIEVEMENTS to complete and show everyone you‚Äôre the best RTS commander in the whole galaxy! ‚Ä¢ NO WI-FI IN SPACE? No worries, offline play guaranteed! ‚Ä¢ CHOOSE YOUR DIFFICULTY MODE: Casual, Normal or Veteran. Don‚Äôt get cocky! Or Do! Your choice! ‚Ä¢ IMPOSSIBLE MODE. Only for the most daring, reckless, all-out-of-bubblegum marines in space. We dare you!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: MEGA MAN X DiVE Offline
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$29.99 ‚Üí $9.89 [$9.89 ~ $29.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$9.89

Application Description

‚ñ†‚ñ† Caution ‚ñ†‚ñ† Please check the "Regarding Purchases" and "Supported Devices" notices below before purchasing or using the app. --- Game Introduction --- Mega Man X DiVE reimagined the world of the Mega Man X series, and now it's getting an offline version! Experience the exciting side-scrolling action we've all come to know and love in a whole new light! Enter Deep Log, a digital world where the game data of the Mega Man X series has been archived. Due to a bug of unknown origins, the game data within Deep Log has become fragmented. With the help of a mysterious navigator, RiCO, the player dives into this digital world to set things straight. Take control of Hunter Programs, recreations of legendary characters such as X and Zero, defeat various forms of Irregular Data, and restore the fractured game data! - Classic Mega Man Action Jump, dash, fire your buster, and swing your saber. All the actions you'd expect from the Mega Man X series are here! In addition, this game features 360 degree aiming and an auto-lock function! You can also scale and position the touchscreen controls to match your own unique playstyle. - Featuring over 100 Characters from the Mega Man Series Acquire your favorite characters from across the Mega Man universe to add to your collection, and level them up to make them stronger! With a mix of brand-new original characters and new designs for fan-favorites, there are plenty out there to discover! - An All-New Original Story with Hundreds of Stages to Enjoy Immerse yourself in a new Mega Man tale that can only be experienced in Mega Man X DiVE. Blast and cut your way through hundreds of stages spanning multiple difficulty levels! - Make Your Characters Stronger with Weapons, Chips, and Cards Characters can equip all types of weapons to become stronger. Upgrade a weapon's rank to increase its power and unlock new skills. Cards featuring classic illustrations also provide boosts, making them fun items to collect as you craft your perfect Hunter Program! „ÄêRegarding Purchases„Äë Regardless of the reason, we cannot offer refunds (or an exchange for another product or service) once the app is purchased. „ÄêSupported Devices„Äë Please check the following URL for a list of operating environments (devices/OSs) supported by this app. https://www.capcom-games.com/megaman/xdive-offline/en-us/ Note: Although you can purchase this app using devices and OSs not listed as supported, the app may not function properly. Please be aware that we can neither guarantee the app's performance nor offer refunds if you use a device or OS not supported by the app. „ÄêEnjoy More Capcom Titles!„Äë Search for "Capcom" in the App Store, or the name of one of our apps, for more fun games to play!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Ace Attorney Trilogy
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$24.99 ‚Üí $14.99 [$14.99 ~ $24.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$14.99

Application Description

‚ñ†‚ñ† Caution ‚ñ†‚ñ† Please check the "Regarding Purchases" and "Supported Devices" notices below before purchasing or using the app. --- Game Introduction --- Become a lawyer and take the stand to prove your client‚Äôs innocence in a court of law! Enjoy rookie attorney Phoenix Wright's first three games in the popular series, all in one package! All 14 thrilling episodes of Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney, Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney ‚Äì Justice for All, and Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney ‚Äì Trials and Tribulations are included!F6 With high-resolution graphics, courtroom battles never looked this beautiful! On top of Japanese and English, you can experience the world of Ace Attorney in French, German, Chinese (simplified and traditional), and Korean as well! Just swap to your preferred language in the Options menu! The number of save slots has increased to ten! There are now ten save slots per language available across all three games! „ÄêGame Overview„Äë There's been a murder! Uncover the truth to save your innocent client! - Investigation Gather information and evidence related to the case! - Courtroom Outwit cunning prosecutors and call out witnesses to discover what really happened by finding inconsistencies in their statements! Solve the intriguing mysteries behind each case and witness the final truth for yourself! Note: During normal conversation, you can fast-forward the dialogue by holding the text skip button. Note: This collection is the same as the one previously released on home gaming platforms. „ÄêRegarding Purchases„Äë Regardless of the reason, we cannot offer refunds (or an exchange for another product or service) once the app is purchased. „ÄêSupported Devices„Äë Please check the following URL for a list of operating environments (devices/OSs) supported by this app. https://www.capcom-games.com/product/en-us/aceattorney-trilogy-app/?t=openv Note: Although you can purchase this app using devices and OSs not listed as supported, the app may not function properly. Please be aware that we can neither guarantee the app's performance nor offer refunds if you use a device or OS not supported by the app. „ÄêEnjoy More Capcom Titles!„Äë Search for "Capcom" in the App Store, or the name of one of our apps, for more fun games to play!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Street Fighter IV CE
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $3.99 [$3.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$3.99

Application Description

A new warrior has entered the ring! Take control of 32 world warriors and test your mettle against players from around the world. Street Fighter IV: Champion Edition perfects the winning gameplay formula by offering higher resolution graphics, three new characters (Rose, Juri and Elena) wide screen support for newer iOS devices and a host of updates and refinements. Long time Street Fighter fans can jump into the action and have an instant familiarity with the controls. For more casual players Street Fighter IV features numerous settings and tutorials that put you on the path to victory. ‚Ä¢ Fight as 32 Street Fighter characters ‚Ä¢ Higher resolution graphics and wide screen support ‚Ä¢ Intuitive virtual pad controls allow players to execute full move sets including Unique Attacks, Special Moves, Focus Attacks, Super Combos and Ultra Combos ‚Ä¢ Take your game to the next level with a MFi controller like the Gamevice (MFi controllers do not work in menus, they fully function in multiplayer and single-player gameplay.) ‚Ä¢ Battle head-to-head against players from around the world via Wifi ‚Ä¢ Single player ‚Äúarcade‚Äù and multiplayer modes. ‚Ä¢ Unleash super moves with a tap of the ‚ÄúSP‚Äù button. ‚Ä¢ Four levels of difficulty. Please check [Supported OS and Devices] in the lower part of HP. https://www.capcom-games.com/product/en-us/streetfighter4-championedition/?t=openv

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$12.99

Application Description

The best interactive app for learning musculoskeletal anatomy.¬† AnatomyMapp¬Æ¬†combines an empowering collection of study tools for the popular¬†Trail Guide to the Body‚Äîa best-selling musculoskeletal anatomy textbook‚Äîinto a single interactive app! It's great for not only reinforcing your textbook learning but also¬†for studying while on the bus,¬†having a snack, or pretty much wherever you have your phone. ¬† AnatomyMapp¬Æ¬†includes information from all 362¬†Trail Guide to the Body Flashcards; questions from the¬†Trail Guide to the Body¬†Student Workbook; and easy search and bookmarking capabilities: ‚Ä¢ Test your musculoskeletal anatomy knowledge by (1) answering multiple choice question (muscle cards only); (2) locating specific structures; or (3) identifying¬†actions, origins, insertions, and nerve innervations (AOIN). ‚Ä¢ Bookmark specific cards to review later and use enhanced navigation features for bookmarked cards. ‚Ä¢ Apply the easy search function to choose all cards or only cards you‚Äôve bookmarked. ‚Ä¢ Find additional information in the¬†Trail Guide to the Body¬†textbook with page references on each card. ‚Ä¢ Zoom into cards to enhance your view of the illustrations. ‚Ä¢ Learn correct pronunciation using the app‚Äôs audio pronunciation. ¬† Designed to be viewed in portrait mode.¬† ¬† If you have any comments or suggestions, we‚Äôd like to hear from you at¬†info@booksofdiscovery.com. ¬† More than 2,000 manual therapy programs have chosen¬†Trail Guide to the Body¬†products for their students. The textbook is sold in nearly 40 countries. ¬† AnatomyMapp¬Æ is a registered trademark of Books of Discovery. Learn more at booksofdiscovery.com.

entry.title: The Greedy Cave
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Coupon of the Greedy CaveÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $9.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

In-App Purchases

  • Coupon of the Greedy CaveÔºö$0.99
  • Package8Ôºö$49.99
  • Package7Ôºö$29.99

Application Description

In a land far, far away there once was a vast continent called Milton. It was a land where the power of rule came by the sword and the arcane, where Men who devoted themselves to the blade or to magecraft, could become the finest warriors, wisest wizards or the greatest adventurers. In this land, there are several kingdoms divided by borders but united through history. Countless stories of alliances, upheaval, and moments of peace bedeck this tapestry, but that is a tale for another day. Our story begins in a remote kingdom to the north, Iblis, an obscure and oft-forgotten place. It is a wild and barren land, a place where its people scrape a living from the earth, mining minerals for the lords of the south. On occasion, adventurers would stop by for the night but never linger. Until one day, a fledgling adventurer lost his way and stumbled into a hole. The story might have ended then had he not come back, but return he did, with sacks of gold and glittering treasure. Like a fierce gale from the north, news of his fame and fortune fanned across the kingdoms overnight, and kings sent their bravest warriors and adventurers to clear the cavern of monsters in search of treasure. Even peasants wanting a part of this newfound wealth partook in these expeditions. In no time at all, a bustling town had sprung up in this forgotten place. People set up camps, and formed their own groups to explore the cave. Clever merchants not missing this opportunity, built taverns and shops near the cave, selling equipment and potions to eager adventurers. At first, everything seemed fine. As explorers delved into the caves, they encountered new creatures and discovered new treasures. Mysteries continued to pour forth from the cave, yet nobody knew where the source of the secrets lay. However, as the explorations continued, the balance of wealth beyond the cave began to waver, and cracks appeared among those adventurers who had previously worked arm-in-arm. The latecomers or weak, limited to wandering the upper levels of the cave, could only watch as the veteran adventurers brought treasure after treasure from the deep. They began harboring dark thoughts as they watched the veteran adventurers grow arrogant from their largesse, ordering people around, hoarding secrets from the rest. The place became a festering pool of suspicions and greed, mired in a jealous rage. It started with an adventurer disappearing in the cave. Rumors circulated he had found some legendary treasure and hoarded it for himself. Others said he had been guided to another world by some mysterious magic force in the cave. Still, the unspoken belief was that he had been murdered by a rival party and was buried somewhere beneath the caverns. Nobody knows exactly what happened, but people have continued to disappear ever since. As more people have gone missing, some adventurers have called it quits, others cling to hope, and a few continue to wait and see. Which brings us to you, an ordinary young man, coming into this extraordinary circumstance with purposes unknown to others. May you find what you seek in ... -------------------------------------------------------- In " The Greedy Cave", you are a brave adventurer tasked with exploring a mysterious cave and battling all kinds of monsters. Use your wits to defeat them, learn different skills, gain mighty equipment, challenge evil monster bosses, and decipher the mystery surrounding this cave... Game Features ¬∑Randomly generated cave levels provide a different game experience every time! ¬∑Hundreds of monsters to defeat! ¬∑Hundreds of equipment to collect! ¬∑Hundreds of quests and achievements to conquer! ¬∑Enchant/Reform/Level up/Gold collecting, and more abundant systems to explore! Contact us cs.thegreedycave@avalongames.com https://www.facebook.com/greedycave/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Luwian
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [Free ~ $5.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images. The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel. Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography. Main Panel Features : Exposure control Focus + focus lock control Zoom White balance ISO Shutter speed Target grid Fullscreen Orientation indicator Current resolution indicator Torch mode: auto / on / off Flash mode: auto / on / off Camera switch menu Video recording switch button: Normal / Slow Motion / Time-lapse Shutter button Video recording button Dual camera recording mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) True depth backdrop camera (only iPhone 11 and later models) Shutter Timer Manual mode Auto mode Portrait mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) Analog film mode Cinetone filter mode Classic filters and VFX Menu Luwian Raw Magic Lite All Raw Magic Lite Features : Import / Select / Delete Media EXIF info and details Photo edit crop resize Video edit crop resize (BETA) Photo / Video adjust Photo / Video general filters and VFX Photo / Video analog filters Photo / Video cinetone filters All Settings Features : Photo quality setup Camera preset access and video recording FPS setup Time-lapse speed 2x to 10x Turn on and off the main panel filter view The shutter timer is set up from three sec. to 15 sec. About section and link to support page

entry.title: LMP - Music Hub
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin. ‚ñ£ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant. ‚ñ£ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers. ‚ñ£ Manage playlists with ease LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist. When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy. ‚ñ£ Supports CarPlay & Siri With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track. ‚ñ£ Support LRC lyrics LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing. ‚ñ£ Browser Assistant Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Streets of Rage 4
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

In-App Purchases

  • Mr. X Nightmare DLCÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Punch your way through the Streets of Rage once again! Streets of Rage 4 takes forward the Streets of Rage legacy in this retro beat'em up with hand-drawn comic inspired graphics and updated mechanics. Streets of Rage comes back for a sequel 25 years after the last episode : a new crime syndicate seems to have taken control of the streets and corrupted the police. All you have to fight against them is your friends... and your fists ! Critically acclaimed, Streets of Rage 4 won several awards and nominated as Best Action Games at the 2020 Game Awards. FEATURES - Rediscover the classic Beat em up Streets of Rage Franchise with new fight mechanics - Get thrilled by the Retro hand-drawn comics-inspired artistic direction by the studio behind Wonder Boy: The Dragon‚Äôs Trap serving juicy animations & vivid FX - Unlock up to 5 new & emblematic playable characters and fight your way through 12 various stages to bring back order to the streets - Challenge yourself in different modes : Story, Training, Arcade... - Listen to a new Electro OST with world class musicians such as Olivier Derivi√®re and legend Yuzo Koshiro - Brand-new custom survival mode to the DLC (Mr. X Nightmare) - New destroyables to help to maintain the combo counter"- Get retro with up to 13 alternative retro characters, secret retro levels or choose the SoR1&2 OST and enable the Retro Pixel graphics ! * NEW MAJOR FREE UPDATE* - New co-op moves - +300 in-game improvements - Brand-new custom survival mode to the DLC (Mr. X Nightmare) - New destroyables to help to maintain the combo counter -MULTIPLAYER UPDATE- - Play online with a partner and gang up to defeat the Y twins' evil plan together! - Test your strength : hop in Battle Mode and fight your friends across your favorite levels" -Mr. X Nightmare DLC- The fight continues in Wood Oak City. After the events of Streets of Rage 4, our heroes wanted to prepare themselves for future threats. Axel, Blaze and their mates will start a very special deranged training with the help of Dr. Zan, who built an AI program from the remnants of Mister X‚Äôs brain that simulates every kind of danger they could be facing. With this DLC, get ready for: ‚Ä¢ 3 new playable characters ‚Ä¢ A new Survival mode with weekly challenges ‚Ä¢ Character customization: build your own fighting style with new moves ‚Ä¢ New weapons and enemies!o note that multiplayer mode will not be available at launch but will come in a free update after release. CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE - Revamped interface - Game Center achievements - iCloud - Share your progress between iOS devices - Compatible with MFicontrollers - No micro-transactions! Crack your knuckles and get ready for Streets of Rage 4 everywhere you go! If you run into a problem, please contact us at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com with as much information as possible on the issue, or check our FAQ at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/6-streets-of-rage-4/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: PlayNav - No ads in videos!
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Premium FeaturesÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.49 ~ $9.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Premium FeaturesÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Are you tired of interruptions caused by ads in your YouTube videos? The new YouTube PlayNav video browser will block all intrusive ads that appear while watching your videos, so you can enjoy your favorite videos smoothly and without interruptions. Plus, our app offers features you‚Äôll love: ‚Ä¢ On-Screen Playback: Watch YouTube videos while using other apps. ‚Ä¢ Audio-Only Mode: Listen to any YouTube video with your screen locked. ‚Ä¢ Auto Shutdown: Set a sleep timer. (Premium) ‚Ä¢ Loop Mode: Automatically repeat your favorite videos. ‚Ä¢ Learning Mode: Learn languages using subtitles. (Premium) It also includes essential features such as playlists, speed adjustment (improved), related videos, AirPlay, and more to enhance your video-watching experience. ¬ª HOW TO USE PLAYNAV? ON-SCREEN PLAYBACK (PIP) (Premium) Watch YouTube videos while using any other app. Once activated, the player will shrink on your screen, allowing you to move or hide it with a double tap. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. While playing a video, tap the PIP icon in the upper-left corner (two small screen icons). 2. While a video is playing, swipe up from the bottom of your iPhone, and the player will appear on your screen. AUDIO-ONLY MODE Listen to the audio of your favorite YouTube videos with your iPhone screen locked. Use it while exercising, walking, or before bed. Combine it with the auto shutdown feature to relax while listening to your favorite videos! ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Enable On-Screen Playback. 2. Then, lock your iPhone, and the audio will continue playing. AUTO SHUTDOWN Bedtime? Find your favorite YouTube video or playlist, set the auto shutdown timer, and let your favorite audio accompany you as you fall asleep. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Tap the Sleep icon (moon) in the player. 2. Select the time you want for auto shutdown. 3. You can combine it with Audio-Only Mode. LOOP MODE (REPEAT VIDEO) Want your video to play on repeat? Use Loop Mode to replay your video as many times as you like. You can also combine it with Audio-Only Mode. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Tap the Repeat icon. Your video will keep playing on loop until you disable it. LEARN LANGUAGES WITH SUBTITLES (LEARNING MODE) Now you can learn languages using subtitles! When you activate Learning Mode, you will see both the original subtitles and the translation in your language. You can also adjust the playback speed to better understand each word. ¬ª How to activate it? 1 Search for videos in the language you are learning. 2 Once your video starts playing, tap the Learning Mode button next to the video title. ‚Äì TRY PLAYNAV NOW! ‚Äì Enjoy all basic features for free and unlock Premium with a one-time purchase. Minimum requirements: ‚Ä¢ iOS 15 or higher. ‚Ä¢ 3G connection or higher. ¬ª Related keywords: YouTube, YouTube Music, YouTube Vanced, ad blocker, no subscription, skip YouTube ads, ad-free music, block pop-ups, adblock for YouTube, block pop-up ads, ad-free content, premium ad blocker, AdBlock Plus, remove ads, YouTube without ads. - Need help? Visit: playnav.vidiom.app or contact us at info@playnav.vidiom.app Terms of Service: playnav.vidiom.app/terms-of-service Privacy Policy: playnav.vidiom.app/privacy-policy

entry.title: Controller for HomeKit
entry.content:
Discount Information

  • Lifetime licenseÔºö$99.99 ‚Üí $49.99 [$49.99 ~ $99.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • PRO yearly subscriptionÔºö$39.99
  • Lifetime licenseÔºö$49.99
  • Monthly SubscriptionÔºö$5.49
  • Yearly SubscriptionÔºö$19.99

Application Description

Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility. * FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan. * COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs. * NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home. * BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed. * SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters. * WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home. * SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost. * MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken. * LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home. * WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan. Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be. For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com Privacy Policy: https://controllerforhomekit.com/privacy-en/ Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
